entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for his love of magical creatures. He is described as having a shaking voice when he says 'Can't have'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends and is described as seizing Hagrid's binoculars to look at the crowd.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends and is described as being grey-faced when he asks Hermione what she is doing.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts and is described as muttering non-stop under his breath while looking at Harry with his eyes fixed.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is described as having his broom vibrating hard, making it difficult for him to hang on.

entities.name: nimbus two thousand
entities.description: The Nimbus Two Thousand is a type of broomstick that Harry is riding.

relationships.description: Snape is described as muttering non-stop under his breath while looking at Harry, suggesting that he is jinxing the broom.
Hermione gasps and says 'I knew it' when she sees Snape in the stands opposite them, indicating that she has seen him.
Ron grabs Hagrid's binoculars to look at Harry and Snape.
